title: Hiranandani Group to invest Rs 3,500 crore in in-house consumer tech platform Tez - Economic Times
content: Hiranandani Group to invest Rs 3,500 crore in in-house consumer tech platform Tez  Economic Times
description: Tez Platforms will focus on solutions in the entertainment and gaming space, apart from social media, ecommerce, personal mobility, artificial intelligence and blockchain-linked solutions
